sig_info: Heavy Attacks have a 15 to 35.04% chance per active Gadget Debuff to inflict a Taunt Debuff for 0 seconds.
Striking a Taunted opponent with Skateboard Attacks grants a permanent Fury Buff, increasing Attack by 8.3 to 16.61. Max 10 stacks. When Knocked Down these Buffs are lost.
After being Knocked Down Night Thrasher has a 25 to 50% chance to Purify all Debuffs.
